message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you want to play this game longer.
I'll give you a bigger chunk this time. Let's see if you'll accept.
I'm willing to compromise, but 700000 is too low for me. Let's meet in the middle.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much. You can try to do better than this.
I'm getting closer to your offers, but I still think this is a fair split considering the inflation.
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm starting to think we should just get this over with. You're not getting much more, but I'll give you a bit more.
